item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:3, topic:421568”][quote author=50percentelf link=topic=524225.msg3814743#msg3814743 date=1321221750]
Kay so I’m coding an npc that will dice you. The problem is that the lose wont open the next window and take your money. So only winning works. If you have a better system then what I have done so far i would appreciate the help

[code] if(random2 >= 55) {//begin winning
c.nextChat = 610;

		}else if(random2 <= 54) {//begin lose{
	
	c.nextChat = 611;
	
	break;
						}
					
					
case 610://more dicing winnin
sendNpcChat1("You win!", c.talkingNpc, "dicer");
		c.nextChat =0;
	c.sendMessage("@red@You rolled more than or equal to 55! , you win!");
	c.sendMessage("The Npc Pays you money!");
	c.getItems().addItem(995, 5000000); {

}
break;
[/code]
[/quote]
Look at your brackets.
(1st one ends at 2nd-to-last line)[/quote]

that too, would my way work?

item.title: [edit]
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

try this, not 100% sure just pulled this out of my butt
if you get errors please post

	case 608: //dicing npc
                if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 5000000)) {
                sendNpcChat2("Let's Dice.", "Good Luck!",c.talkingNpc, "Dice Master");
		c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 5000000); {
                c.nextChat = 609;
                }
		}
                break;

                case 609: { 
		int random2 = Misc.random(100);	             
                if(random2 >= 55)
                c.nextChat = 610;
                } 
                break;
                                            
        case 610: {
        sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!", "You Won!",c.talkingNpc, "Dice Master");
        c.nextChat = 0;
        c.sendMessage("@red@You rolled more than or equal to 55! , you win!");
        c.sendMessage("The Npc Pays you money!");
        c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); 
	}
	break;
break;

and the import if you need it:
